summary:
Skype is a popular app for talking and messaging with friends and family. It lets you make video calls, voice calls, and send messages over the internet. You can also call regular phones using Skype.

Created in 2003, Skype was bought by Microsoft in 2011. It works on many devices, like computers, phones, and game consoles. Skype's special feature is its ability to connect people worldwide, even if they're using different devices. As of 2023, millions of people use Skype daily.
title: Skype
